email_chain.subject: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

I hope this message finds you well. We have the MV OCEAN BREEZE available for your coal shipment from Newcastle to Shanghai. Vessel details: DWT 85000, LOA 225m. Freight rate is $42/MT CIF. Laycan is 15-20 October. Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan
Maritime Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thank you for the offer. The rate seems a bit high. Can you do $38/MT? Also, can you confirm the loading window and demurrage rate?

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Thank you for your response. The loading window is 72 hours, and the demurrage rate is $10,000/day. The best I can do is $40/MT. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer for Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Thanks for the update. Let's proceed with $40/MT. Please send the recap.

Best,
Laura Smith

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Dear Laura,

Please find recap below:
- Commodity: Coal
- Cargo Size: 75000MT
- Load Port: Newcastle
- Disch Port: Shanghai
- Freight Rate: $40/MT CIF
- Laycan: 15-20 October
- Demurrage: $10,000/day

Let me know if any corrections needed.

Best regards,
Alex Morgan

email_chain.subject: Re: Recap - Coal Shipment - MV OCEAN BREEZE
email_chain.body:
Hi Alex,

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the booking.

Best,
Laura Smith
